thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Spacious Suite
thread.title_full: Spacious Suite - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: CAcakelady
title: Spacious Suite
text: I must say...I enjoyed every bit of my stay at the Westin SF Airport. The suite I booked was spacious...everything was nice and clean...the hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. Had the buffet breakfast the next morning and it was pretty good. Everything was nice and fresh and they replenished it often. I'll definitely book with Westin again.
